contents: Article 9 (Membership/Grade Deliberation Committee) ① The Athletic Association shall form a Membership/Grade Deliberation Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *Committee) to deliberate on membership, promotion, demotion, expulsion, etc. ② The committee deliberates on the following matters. 1. Matters pertaining to membership of member organizations pursuant to Article 4 2. Matters pertaining to promotion, demotion and expulsion of member sports organizations pursuant to Articles 5 to 7 3. Other matters determined to require deliberation by the Sports Council ③ The Committee It is organized and operated as follows. 1. Members shall be appointed by the Chairman as persons with specialized knowledge regarding the purpose and activities of the Committee and experience related to the relevant field, and the Secretary General of the Sports Association and the Director of the Sports Promotion Center shall be ex officio members. 2. The chairman shall be the Secretary General and the committee shall consist of 9 to 11 members. 3. The committee opens with the attendance of a majority of registered members and makes decisions with the approval of a majority of members present.
